TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit StackFrame extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 的相關資訊，代表目前執行緒的呼叫堆疊上的函式呼叫。

span.span: Provides information about a , which represents a function call on the call stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A建立後，每個執行緒的執行期間所做的函式呼叫的呼叫堆疊上推入。A is created and pushed on the call stack for every function call made during the execution of a thread. 堆疊框架一定會包含的詳細資訊，並選擇性地包含檔案名稱、 行號和資料行號資訊。The stack frame always includes information, and optionally includes file name, line number, and column number information. 就會使用偵錯組建組態的資訊最多資訊。 information will be most informative with Debug build configurations. 根據預設，偵錯組建中包含偵錯符號，但不需要發行組建。By default, Debug builds include debug symbols, while Release builds do not. 偵錯符號包含大部分的檔案、 方法名稱、 行號和資料行資訊用來建構物件。The debug symbols contain most of the file, method name, line number, and column information used in constructing objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以提供堆疊追蹤的堆疊框架資訊。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to provide the stack frame information for a stack trace. [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stackframesample2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stackframesample2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用之成員的類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the members of the class. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得檔案中的欄位數目，含有正在執行的程式碼。

span.span: Gets the column number in the file that contains the code that is executing.

summary.span: 這項資訊通常擷取自可執行檔的偵錯符號。

span.span: This information is typically extracted from the debugging symbols for the executable.

returns.span: 檔案欄號，如果無法確定檔案欄號則為 0 (零)。

span.span: The file column number, or 0 (zero) if the file column number cannot be determined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetILOffset() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetILOffset () As Integer

summary.span: 為正在執行的方法取得從 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 程式碼起始的位移。

span.span: Gets the offset from the start of the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) code for the method that is executing.

summary.span: 這項位移可能是大約值，這是根據 Just-In-Time (JIT) 編譯器是否產生偵錯程式碼而定。

span.span: This offset might be an approximation depending on whether or not the just-in-time (JIT) compiler is generating debugging code.

summary.span: 由 控制產生這個偵錯資訊。

span.span: The generation of this debugging information is controlled by the .

returns.span: 從 MSIL 程式碼起始的位移，用於正在執行的方法。

span.span: The offset from the start of the MSIL code for the method that is executing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.MethodBase GetMethod() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetMethod () As MethodBase

summary.span: 取得框架正在執行的所在方法。

span.span: Gets the method in which the frame is executing.

returns.span: 框架正在執行的所在方法。

span.span: The method in which the frame is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前執行的方法可以繼承自基底類別，雖然它在衍生類別中呼叫。The method that is currently executing may be inherited from a base class, although it is called in a derived class. 在此情況下，屬性所傳回的物件識別的基底類別，而不是衍生的類別。In this case, the property of the object that is returned by identifies the base class, not the derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CPP/stacktracesample3.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CS/stacktracesample3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/VB/stacktracesample3.vb#6)]

summary.span: 為正在執行的方法取得從原生 (Native) Just-In-Time (JIT) 編譯程式碼起始的位移。

span.span: Gets the offset from the start of the native just-in-time (JIT)-compiled code for the method that is being executed.

summary.span: 由 類別控制產生這個偵錯資訊。

span.span: The generation of this debugging information is controlled by the class.

returns.span: 從 JIT 編譯程式碼起始的位移，用於正在執行的方法。

span.span: The offset from the start of the JIT-compiled code for the method that is being executed.

summary.span: 當原生的 (Native) 或 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的位移不明時，定義傳回自 或 方法的值。

span.span: Defines the value that is returned from the or method when the native or Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset is unknown.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個常數的值為-1。The value of this constant is -1.
